name: Marketplace
eComp: +1 influence upon a successful trade with another player.
eVisitO: +1 resource of any kind upon a successful Trade.

name: Housing
eVisitX: Take a Build Action on any tile. This uses your Build Action for the turn.
eVisitO: You may take a Build Action. If it is your turn, take an additional Build Action.

name: Pendantmaker
eVisitX: You may pay 4 crystals to receive a spell component of any kind.

name: Baths
eVisitO: you may dry or flood one tile

name: Amphitheater
eVisitX: exchange one sigil with the bank

name: Sewers
eComp: add three sewer tiles below this tile and two adjacent tiles. +6 influence

name: Basilica
eComp: Adjust your alignment to whatever you want. Your alignment adjusts give you +1 influence.
eVisitX: adjust alignment by 2. you may cast an additional spell this turn.
eVisitO: you may adjust your alignment by 1

name: Hippodrome
eComp: get +1 influence per layer from now on
eVisitO: +1  vote on objection during the duel
